SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api.annotations
Annotation Type ClientAction

@Target(value=METHOD)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface ClientAction

This annotation marks method as client action method. Together with ClientActionClass, client action annotation provides complete information about single client action. Using client action methods, server can send messages to client. Method parameters are serialized to array as the message payload. Under the hood, ConditionObjectSender is used. Each parameter can be validated using Bind annotation. If any parameter is not meant to be serialized, simply use Ignore on that parameter. Action methods must have one of the fallowing return types:

  • SendCondition implementation.
  • IdentifiedUser implementation.
  • List of IdentifiedUser implementations.
List of recipients is determined using returned object.

Created on: 2012-05-26 10:38:26

Author:
Wojciech Niemiec
See Also:
ClientActionClass

Optional Element Summary
 java.lang.String value
          Gets custom client action name.
 

value

public abstract java.lang.String value
Gets custom client action name. If not defined, method name is used as client action name.

Returns:
custom client action name.
Default:
""
